text: He also fought with the king of the children of Ammon, and prevailed against them. The children of Ammon gave him the same year one hundred talents27:5 A talent is about 30 kilograms or 66 pounds of silver, ten thousand cors27:5 1 cor is the same as a homer, or about 55.9 U. S. gallons (liquid) or 211 liters or 6 bushels. 10,000 cors of wheat would weigh about 1,640 metric tons. of wheat, and ten thousand cors of barley.27:5 10,000 cors of barley would weigh about 1,310 metric tons. The children of Ammon also gave that much to him in the second year, and in the third.
